alert.note: Alert for Dodge (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 12:42PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Columbia and western Dodge Counties through 130 PM CDT... At 1241 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rio, or 11 miles northwest of Columbus, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Watertown, Beaver Dam, Columbus, Juneau, Fall River, Rio, Burnett, Wyocena, Reeseville, Otsego, Richwood, Clyman, Lowell, Doylestown, Danville, South Beaver Dam, Minnesota Junction and Leipsig. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
